translation.en: Male Narrator: Once upon a time...
translation.ja: 昔々…

translation.en: In a faraway land--
translation.ja: はるか遠い国で…

translation.en: I am Raven Queen,
translation.ja: 私はレイヴン･クイーン

translation.en: daughter of the evil queen.
translation.ja: 悪の女王の娘です

translation.en: And I pledge...
translation.ja: 私はここに誓います

translation.en: - Um, I-- - Come on, do it.
translation.ja: さあ 言って

translation.en: I-- ( sighs )
translation.ja: 私は…

translation.en: Male Narrator: All eyes were on Raven as she faced the most important choice--
translation.ja: 誰もがレイヴンを 見つめる中…

translation.en: - ( record scratches ) - Female Narrator: Really? You're gonna start there? At Legacy Day?
translation.ja: そこから始めるの？

translation.en: Male Narrator: You know there's only really room
translation.ja: 口を出すな

translation.en: for one narrator here. Female Narrator: Start at the beginning, where the whole Rebel and Royal drama began.
translation.ja: レベルとロイヤルの 説明が先でしょ

translation.en: Male Narrator: Oh fine. Gather 'round, friends,
translation.ja: 分かったよ エバー･アフター･ハイの 物語を聞かせてあげよう

translation.en: and let us tell you a story, the story of Ever After High.
translation.ja: エバー･アフター･ハイの 物語を聞かせてあげよう

translation.en: Male Narrator: A high school for the teenage sons and daughters... - ( grunts ) - of the most famous fairy-tale characters... - ( ribbits ) - who ever lived.
translation.ja: そこは おとぎ話の人物の 子供たちが通う高校

translation.en: Male Narrator: But this year was like no other - ( bleating ) - for the students of Ever After High.
translation.ja: この年は生徒たちにとって 特別なものであった

translation.en: It was the year of Legacy Day--
translation.ja: レガシー･デーは

translation.en: - ( chirps ) - a momentous event where the students pledge to all the magical world
translation.ja: 生徒たちにとっての 一大イベント

translation.en: to follow the same paths as their fairy-tale parents.
translation.ja: 親と同じ人生を 歩むことを誓うのだ

translation.en: Female Narrator: Which they better do, or else.
translation.ja: 誓わなければ…

translation.en: Male Narrator: I'm sorry. Who's telling this story? If you don't--
translation.ja: おい 僕の番だ 君は黙ってて…

translation.en: Would you two stop fighting? Peas and crackers.
translation.ja: ケンカはやめて！ まったくもう

translation.en: Um, who are you talking to?
translation.ja: 誰と話してるの？

translation.en: Why, the narrators.
translation.ja: ナレーターよ

translation.en: Oh, you can't hear them, Raven. Only I can.
translation.ja: 私にしか聞こえないの

translation.en: - Okay. - ( gasps, giggles )
translation.ja: そう

translation.en: - Can I talk now? - Mm-hmm.
translation.ja: 聞いてくれる？

translation.en: It's just-- I'm sick of everyone thinking I'm so evil because my mom was.
translation.ja: 私はママと同じで 意地悪だと思われてる

translation.en: It's not fair!
translation.ja: ひどいわ！

translation.en: No one thinks you're evil. Now you're just talking crazy.
translation.ja: そんなことないわ おかしな人ね

translation.en: - ( mimic bell ) - The daughter of the Mad Hatter calls me crazy? ( sighs )
translation.ja: マッドハッターの娘が 私をおかしいと？

translation.en: Would you stop with the worry flurry?
translation.ja: 心配しないで

translation.en: Everyone at school loves you.
translation.ja: あなたは人気者よ

translation.en: It's Raven Queen! Run!
translation.ja: レイヴン･クイーンだ 逃げろ！

translation.en: She is evil!
translation.ja: 彼女は邪悪だ

translation.en: Run, everyone.
translation.ja: みんな逃げて

translation.en: See? They love you.
translation.ja: ほら　みんなに愛されてる

translation.en: Yay! Tea time.
translation.ja: ティータイムよ

translation.en: - Earl Grey. - ( squeaking )
translation.ja: アールグレイ　お利口さんね

translation.en: Oh, you clever dormouse. Why yes,
translation.ja: アールグレイ　お利口さんね ええ これは新しいドレスよ

translation.en: this is a new dress.
translation.ja: ええ これは新しいドレスよ

translation.en: Male Narrator: And so, life for Raven was not easy, feeling alone and isolated.
translation.ja: レイヴンは友達も少なく いつも孤独だった

translation.en: Female Narrator: As it should be. She is destined to be evil.
translation.ja: 仕方ないわ そういう運命だもの

translation.en: Male Narrator: Couldn't go 20 seconds without talking, could you?
translation.ja: 少し黙っててくれ

translation.en: Hey, Raven, uh...
translation.ja: やあ レイヴン

translation.en: You look gort. I mean great. I-- I don't even know what gort is.
translation.ja: 天気… いや元気？ 何 言ってるんだろ

translation.en: I'd offer you a seat, but I'm evil.
translation.ja: 隣に座りたいの？ 私は“邪悪”なのよ

translation.en: To sit here, you'd have to be pretty...
translation.ja: 座りたければ…

translation.en: - ...daring. - ( girls cheer )
translation.ja: デアリング

translation.en: Oh, Daring.
translation.ja: ステキ！

translation.en: What? No, Raven. I'm Dex.
translation.ja: 僕はデクスターだよ チャーミング家の

translation.en: Dexter Charming. Daring's my bro-- ther.
translation.ja: 僕はデクスターだよ チャーミング家の デアリングの弟だ

translation.en: Oh, gort.
translation.ja: またか

translation.en: Raven, how's every enchanted thing?
translation.ja: レイヴン　元気？

translation.en: Apple White, good to see you. Hey, Daring.
translation.ja: アップル･ホワイト どうも デアリング

translation.en: I, uh, have to warn you. Don't stare at the teeth. Just got them whitened.
translation.ja: 僕の歯を直視しないで まぶしすぎるから

translation.en: - ( bell rings ) - Oh, oh, there's the bell. Time for Good Kingdom Management.
translation.ja: 王国経営の授業に行かなきゃ

translation.en: Raven, what's your next class?
translation.ja: レイヴンは？

translation.en: Uh, History of Evil Spells.
translation.ja: えっと… “呪いの歴史”

translation.en: ( giggles ) That is so perfect for you.
translation.ja: まあ！ あなたにぴったりね

translation.en: Hey, Cerise, how's it going?
translation.ja: セリース　元気？

translation.en: Oh, uh, sorry. I-- I have a cold.
translation.ja: ごめんなさい　風邪なの

translation.en: Free food!
translation.ja: タダ飯！

translation.en: Male Narrator: That night as Raven returned to her dorm,
translation.ja: その夜 レイヴンが 寮に戻ると

translation.en: she found quite the surprise waiting for her.
translation.ja: サプライズが待っていた

translation.en: Hey, Maddie.
translation.ja: マディ いる？

translation.en: Welcome home, roomie.
translation.ja: おかえり ルームメート

translation.en: Huh, good one, Apple. I'm rooming with Maddie this year.
translation.ja: アップル ルームメートはマディよ

translation.en: Not anymore. Since you're such an important part of my story--
translation.ja: いいえ　あなたは 私の物語に欠かせないわ

translation.en: You poison me. I fall asleep.
translation.ja: 私は毒をもられて…

translation.en: The prince wakes you with a kiss, blah blah blah. Yada yada, I know. So?
translation.ja: 王子のキスで目覚める だから何？

translation.en: So I asked Headmaster Grimm if we could live together.
translation.ja: だからグリム校長に 同室にしてと頼んだの

translation.en: And he said yes. Isn't that enchanting?
translation.ja: そしたら いいって 夢みたいよね

translation.en: Uh, but-- but--
translation.ja: でも…

translation.en: Oh, oh, oh. You are going to love rooming with me.
translation.ja: きっと楽しいわよ

translation.en: I'm thoughtful and beautiful and I sing the most wonderful songs about woodland creatures. ( clears throat )
translation.ja: 私って優しくて美人で 歌も上手なの

translation.en: ♪ Oh the doves love to fly And the hares love to burrow. ♪
translation.ja: ハトは空を舞い   野ウサギは穴を掘る

translation.en: Move along. Move along. Nothing to see here.
translation.ja: さあ行って 見る価値ないから

translation.en: And I already decorated your half of the room.
translation.ja: あなたのエリアを 飾っておいたわ

translation.en: Apple: Isn't it just the evilest?
translation.ja: いかにも邪悪よね

translation.en: ( giggles ) I knew you'd love it.
translation.ja: 気に入った？

translation.en: This is gonna be a long year.
translation.ja: 今年は長い１年になりそう

translation.en: Male Narrator: Which brings us to the rehearsals for the Legacy Day ceremony.
translation.ja: そしてレガシー･デーの リハーサルの日

translation.en: So when your magical key appears, you insert it gently into the Storybook of Legends,
translation.ja: 魔法の鍵が現れたら おとぎ話の本に挿し込み

translation.en: then stand shoulders back and declare your destiny to the world.
translation.ja: 姿勢を正して 自分の運命を宣誓するのだ

translation.en: Have I made myself clear?
translation.ja: 質問は？

translation.en: Headmaster Grimm, but what if--
translation.ja: グリム校長　もし…

translation.en: No questions? Good.
translation.ja: ないね　よし

translation.en: Now, we're going to practice with this tiny manual
translation.ja: ないね　よし では極めて真っ当な 校則本で練習しよう

translation.en: of entirely reasonable school rules.
translation.ja: では極めて真っ当な 校則本で練習しよう

translation.en: Who will go first?
translation.ja: 一番手は？

translation.en: I, Madeline Hatter, pledge to follow the destiny of dear old Dad,
translation.ja: 私 マデリン･ハッターは 父と同じ道を歩みます

translation.en: the Mad Hatter of Wonderland.
translation.ja: 不思議の国の マッドハッターです

translation.en: - ( kettle whistles ) - When do I drink the tea?
translation.ja: お茶にする？

translation.en: Milton Grimm: Next!
translation.ja: 次！

translation.en: I'm Hunter Huntsman and I pledge to follow my destiny
translation.ja: 僕 ハンター･ハンツマンは 狩人として生きます

translation.en: as the next Huntsman. I'll swing my axe bravely and--
translation.ja: 僕 ハンター･ハンツマンは 狩人として生きます 勇敢に斧(おの)を振るい…

translation.en: Really, Pesky? You want to play that way?
translation.ja: ペスキー　ふざけるな

translation.en: Milton Grimm: Next.
translation.ja: 次！

translation.en: I'm-- I'm Cedar Wood and I pledge to follow my destiny and be the next Pinocchio.
translation.ja: 私 シダー･ウッドは 新しいピノキオになります

translation.en: Well, I mean, not the next Pinocchio.
translation.ja: ピノキオとは違うかな

translation.en: I mean, actually, I can only tell the truth while I'm in school, but then one day-- one day, I'm gonna lie.
translation.ja: 学校では嘘はつかないけど いつか嘘をつくかも

translation.en: Uh, but does that mean that I'm gonna be like my dad or not like my dad?
translation.ja: それってパパと一緒？

translation.en: Milton Grimm: Next.
translation.ja: 次！

translation.en: I'm Raven Queen
translation.ja: 私 レイヴン･クイーンは

translation.en: and I pledge to follow my destiny as...
translation.ja: 定められた運命に従い…

translation.en: Um, I have a question.
translation.ja: 質問があります

translation.en: What is it?
translation.ja: 何だね？

translation.en: I was just wondering, I mean, what if I don't want to take the pledge?
translation.ja: もし宣誓しなかったら どうなりますか？

translation.en: What? It's just a question.
translation.ja: 聞いてみただけよ

translation.en: And here's your answer.
translation.ja: では答えよう

translation.en: If you don't pledge your destiny, your story ceases to exist.
translation.ja: 自分の運命を宣誓しなければ 君の物語は消えてなくなる

translation.en: Ceases to exist?
translation.ja: 消えてなくなる？

translation.en: So then what happens to me?
translation.ja: じゃあ私はどうなるの？

translation.en: You will cease to exist.
translation.ja: 君も消えてしまうのだ

translation.en: Now, Raven, continue.
translation.ja: ではレイヴン 続けて

translation.en: - But, Mr. Grimm-- - Poof, poof!
translation.ja: でも校長 消えるぞ

translation.en: I have to go.
translation.ja: 私 行くわ

translation.en: Male Narrator: In the Vault of Lost Tales, deep beneath the school, another was listening.
translation.ja: その時 学校の地下深くで 誰かが聞き耳を立てていた

translation.en: ( crazy laughter )
translation.ja: その時 学校の地下深くで 誰かが聞き耳を立てていた 校長の弟 ジャイルズ･グリムだ

translation.en: Male Narrator: Giles Grimm, the brother of the school's headmaster.
translation.ja: 校長の弟 ジャイルズ･グリムだ

translation.en: The Raven flies. The clouds, they sing.
translation.ja: 大がらす(レイヴン)が飛び立ち 雲が歌う

translation.en: But what should happen when the tide roles in?
translation.ja: だが… この先どうなる？

translation.en: Male Narrator: What will happen, indeed?
translation.ja: さて どうなることやら…

translation.en: Female Narrator: Are you done? Can I tell my side of the story now?
translation.ja: 終わった？ 今度は私の番よね

translation.en: Male Narrator: If you must. Go on..
translation.ja: どうしてもと言うなら 構わんよ

translation.en: Female Narrator: In a faraway land, all eyes were on Apple
translation.ja: アップル･ホワイトは 遠く離れた ある国で

translation.en: as she made the most important declaration of her life.
translation.ja: アップル･ホワイトは 遠く離れた ある国で 皆が注目する中 重大な宣誓を行いました

translation.en: I am Apple White, daughter of Snow White.
translation.ja: 私 アップル･ホワイトは 白雪姫の娘として

translation.en: And I am ready to pledge my destiny. - ( crowd cheers ) - ( record scratches )
translation.ja: 運命に従うことを誓います

translation.en: Male Narrator: Of course you'd start with Apple, always playing favorites. Start at the beginning of the school year.
translation.ja: アップルの話の前に 話すことがあるだろ？

translation.en: Female Narrator: Oh, fine.
translation.ja: いいわ

translation.en: Gather 'round, friends, and let us tell you a story,
translation.ja: では お話ししましょう

translation.en: the story of Ever After High.
translation.ja: エバー･アフター･ハイ

translation.en: - ( grunts ) - A high school
translation.ja: エバー･アフター･ハイ そこは おとぎ話の人物の 子供たちが通う高校

translation.en: - for the teenage sons and daughters... - Hmph. of the most famous fairy-tale characters - who ever lived. - ( growls )
translation.ja: そこは おとぎ話の人物の 子供たちが通う高校

translation.en: Female Narrator: But this year was like no other for the students of Ever After High.
translation.ja: この年は生徒たちにとって 特別なものでした

translation.en: For it is the year of Legacy Day,
translation.ja: これは王族(ロイヤル) アップルの物語 レガシー･デーは 学校の一大イベント

translation.en: a momentous event where the students
translation.ja: レガシー･デーは 学校の一大イベント 生徒たちが仲間の前で

translation.en: pledge to all the magical world
translation.ja: 生徒たちが仲間の前で

translation.en: to follow the same paths as their fairy-tale parents.
translation.ja: 親と同じ人生を 歩むことを誓うのです

translation.en: I can't believe it. Legacy happens this year
translation.ja: 今年はレガシー･デーの年ね

translation.en: and there is just ever so much to do.
translation.ja: やることがたくさん！

translation.en: Totally, right?
translation.ja: だよね

translation.en: I mean, this year's after-party is gonna be a page ripper.
translation.ja: パーティーはすごく 盛り上がりそう

translation.en: - I heard D.J. N-Chant is-- - Briar.
translation.ja: うわさによるとＤＪは…

translation.en: It's not just about the party. This is destiny.
translation.ja: ブライア　大切なのは 私たちの運命よ

translation.en: Future queen! We can't let anyone post embarrassing pictures of us on MyChapter.
translation.ja: 未来の女王として 恥ずかしい姿はさらせない

translation.en: Hey, daughter of Sleeping Beauty.
translation.ja: 私は眠り姫の娘よ

translation.en: If I'm gonna be catching "z's" for a hundred years, I got to live it up now.
translation.ja: 長い眠りにつく前に めいっぱい楽しまないと

translation.en: And come on. No one would post anything bad about you. Everybody loves you.
translation.ja: あなたは何をしたって みんなの人気者よ

translation.en: It's Apple White. ( sighs )
translation.ja: アップル･ホワイトだ！

translation.en: Gorgeous.
translation.ja: ステキ！

translation.en: Tiny: Can I carry your books?
translation.ja: 荷物を運ぶよ

translation.en: Why, Tiny, aren't you the sweetest little thing? Thank you.
translation.ja: タイニー 優しいのね ありがとう

translation.en: See? They love you. Oh, oh.
translation.ja: ほらね　大人気だわ

translation.en: I don't want to miss a minute of our first day.
translation.ja: じゃあ もう行くわね

translation.en: - Hi, everybody. - ( happy murmurs ) Briar: Hey, what's up? Howdy.
translation.ja: ハーイ みんな 元気にしてた？

translation.en: - ( laughs ) - Hey, Prince Daring. Um, why are you holding your hand over your mouth?
translation.ja: デアリング なぜ口を隠してるの？

translation.en: Well, you see, I just got my teeth whitened. And Headmaster Grimm said I can't show people, 'cause--
translation.ja: 歯を白くしたばかりで 校長がみんなに見せるなと

translation.en: But your smile is so charming.
translation.ja: でも笑顔がとてもステキよ

translation.en: - Well, you know-- - Ah! My eyes!
translation.ja: でも ほら

translation.en: I can't see! Ah!
translation.ja: まぶしくて見えない！

translation.en: - Tiny: I'm okay. - ( laughing )
translation.ja: 大丈夫だよ

translation.en: - Apple, Daring... - ( clicks tongue )
translation.ja: アップル　デアリング

translation.en: So any juicy dating details for my mirror-cast show?
translation.ja: あなたたち付き合ってるの？

translation.en: Talk to the mirror.
translation.ja: 鏡に話して

translation.en: Blondie, Daring and I are still not a couple. This is high school.
translation.ja: ブロンディ　違うわ まだ高校生だもの

translation.en: We've got "forever after" to be together.
translation.ja: この先は長いわ

translation.en: But you two are the perfect couple--
translation.ja: でも二人はすごくお似合いよ

translation.en: not too this, not too that. You're just right.
translation.ja: 派手すぎず地味すぎず ちょうどいいの

translation.en: Come on, Apple. Let's go get some lunch.
translation.ja: ランチにしようか

translation.en: Charm you later.
translation.ja: またね

translation.en: Oh, oh. ( giggle )
translation.ja: やだ まぶしい

translation.en: Female Narrator: And so that night, back in the Ever After dorms,
translation.ja: その夜 アップルは寮に戻り

translation.en: Apple had a surprise waiting for her new roommate.
translation.ja: サプライズを 用意していました

translation.en: You think Raven's gonna like this?
translation.ja: レイヴンのため？

translation.en: Of course.
translation.ja: もちろん

translation.en: What future evil queen wouldn't love...
translation.ja: 未来の悪の女王よ

translation.en: an evil throne, an evil crown, and an evil haunted mirror?
translation.ja: 椅子も王冠も鏡も 邪悪な感じでしょ

translation.en: True, but why are you doing this for Raven?
translation.ja: でもなぜレイヴンのために？

translation.en: Because she's such an important part of my story.
translation.ja: 彼女は私の物語に 欠かせないの

translation.en: When she poisons me, it changes everything.
translation.ja: 彼女が私に毒を盛って

translation.en: Then the Prince can wake me and I become queen.
translation.ja: 私は王子と出会い 女王になる

translation.en: That's when I get my "happily ever after."
translation.ja: ハッピーエンドには

translation.en: I need her.
translation.ja: 彼女が必要なの

translation.en: - Raven: Hey, Maddie? - ( knocking )
translation.ja: マディ いる？

translation.en: Uh, quick, hide. I don't want Raven to know you helped me.
translation.ja: 隠れて　このことは内緒に

translation.en: I'll go out the window.
translation.ja: 窓から出るわ

translation.en: I've never done that before.
translation.ja: 初体験よ

translation.en: Welcome home, roomie.
translation.ja: おかえり ルームメート

translation.en: Huh, good one, Apple. I'm rooming with Maddie this year.
translation.ja: アップル 今年はマディと同室よ

translation.en: - Not anymore. - Huh?
translation.ja: いいえ

translation.en: Man! - I am good-looking. - Whee!
translation.ja: わあ！ 僕って なんてハンサム

translation.en: Daring, how'd you know I was gonna be here?
translation.ja: デアリング　なぜここに？

translation.en: Catching damsels in distress-- it's kind of my thing.
translation.ja: 乙女を助けるのが僕の役目だ

translation.en: Well, that was a total rush!
translation.ja: そう　見事なキャッチね

translation.en: Stay here. I'm going again!
translation.ja: もう一度 お願い

translation.en: Hey, you want to get a Hocus Latte?
translation.ja: ラテ飲まない？

translation.en: Uh, that sounds magical. I love mine with nutmeg.
translation.ja: いいわね 私はナツメグ入りが好き

translation.en: - How do you like yours? - Oh, I like a lotta,
translation.ja: いいわね 私はナツメグ入りが好き 私はクリームたっぷりが好き

translation.en: lotta, lotta, lotta, lotta cream.
translation.ja: 私はクリームたっぷりが好き

translation.en: - Hey. - Hi, Ashlynn.
translation.ja: アシュリン

translation.en: Want to go on a nature hike later? I haven't been in the woods in days?
translation.ja: ハイキングしない？ 自然が恋しくて

translation.en: And it just feels so good to get back to what really matters.
translation.ja: 私は何よりも 自然を愛してるの

translation.en: I got a shipment here of 300 new shoes for the Glass Slipper.
translation.ja: 300足のガラスの靴を お届けに来ました

translation.en: New shoes?!
translation.ja: 新しい靴？

translation.en: ( squeals ) Where?
translation.ja: どこ？

translation.en: It's a shoe thing.
translation.ja: 靴フェチね

translation.en: Well, she is Cinderella's daughter.
translation.ja: さすがシンデレラの娘だわ

translation.en: ( bells chime ) Ooh, time for our Legacy Day rehearsal.
translation.ja: レガシー･デーの リハーサルよ

translation.en: I can't wait for everyone to get a glimpse of the queen I am going to become.
translation.ja: 早くみんなの前で 女王になる宣言をしたいわ

translation.en: Female Narrator: But what Apple didn't know was that Raven Queen had other plans--
translation.ja: しかし レイヴンには 別の計画がありました

translation.en: Male Narrator: That would change the world
translation.ja: よりよい世界のために

translation.en: - for the better. - For the worse.
translation.ja: 逆よ

translation.en: So when your magical key appears, you insert it gently into the Storybook of Legends,
translation.ja: 魔法の鍵が現れたら おとぎ話の本に挿し込み

translation.en: then stand shoulders back and declare your destiny to the world.
translation.ja: 姿勢を正して 自分の運命を宣誓するのだ

translation.en: Have I made myself clear?
translation.ja: 質問は？ もし…

translation.en: - But what if-- - No questions? Good.
translation.ja: ないね　よし

translation.en: Who will go first?
translation.ja: 一番手は？

translation.en: Ooh, me, me, me.
translation.ja: はい 私！

translation.en: - Mm, ah, ooh, ooh. - Step right this way, my future queen.
translation.ja: ではどうぞ　未来の女王

translation.en: I am Apple White.
translation.ja: 私 アップル･ホワイトは

translation.en: And I pledge to follow my destiny as the next Snow White.
translation.ja: 運命に従い 新しい白雪姫になります

translation.en: - Perfect. - I know.
translation.ja: すばらしい でしょ？

translation.en: I am Briar Beauty.
translation.ja: 私 ブライア･ビューティは

translation.en: And I pledge to follow in my mom's footsteps and sleep for a hundred years.
translation.ja: 母と同じ道を歩み 100年の眠りにつきます

translation.en: But before I do, I'm gonna live every minute!
translation.ja: でも その前に めいっぱい楽しむわよ

translation.en: Ooh, speaking of which, my dorm room Friday night, we're gonna blow the roof off the place.
translation.ja: 金曜の夜は私の部屋で とことん騒いで…

translation.en: Milton Grimm: Next.
translation.ja: 次！

translation.en: Hey, there. Charming, Daring Charming.
translation.ja: どうも　僕は デアリング･チャーミング

translation.en: I pledge to be just like my old man, King Charming.
translation.ja: 父 キングのように なることを誓います

translation.en: Brave, good-looking, kind, good-looking,
translation.ja: 勇敢でハンサム 優しくてハンサム

translation.en: thoughtful, and good-looking.
translation.ja: 思いやりがありハンサム

translation.en: - ( clicks tongue ) - Next.
translation.ja: 次！

translation.en: I'm Raven Queen.
translation.ja: 私 レイヴン･クイーンは

translation.en: And I pledge to follow my destiny as...
translation.ja: 定められた運命に従い…

translation.en: Um, I have a question.
translation.ja: 質問があります

translation.en: What is it?
translation.ja: 何だね？

translation.en: I was just wondering, I mean, what if I don't want to take the pledge?
translation.ja: もし宣誓しなかったら どうなりますか？

translation.en: She has to do it. I mean, if she never poisons me, then I'll never fall asleep.
translation.ja: ダメよ　彼女が私に 毒を与えなければ

translation.en: And I'll never be kissed by my Prince. And I'll never become queen.
translation.ja: 私は女王になれない

translation.en: And I'll never have my "happily ever after."
translation.ja: ハッピーエンドでなくなるわ

translation.en: Now, Raven, erase that dangerous idea from your head.
translation.ja: そういう危険な考えは 消し去りなさい

translation.en: Continue.
translation.ja: 続けて

translation.en: I have to go.
translation.ja: 私 行くわ

translation.en: - What? - Hey, what about her destiny?
translation.ja: 待って

translation.en: The rules-- I mean, the rules!
translation.ja: ルールを破るのか！

translation.en: Female Narrator: And so Apple took refuge that night in the enchanted forest,
translation.ja: アップルはその夜 魔法の森へ駆け込みました

translation.en: - ( cries ) - wondering what would become of her destiny should Raven not follow hers.
translation.ja: レイヴンが宣誓を拒んだらと 思うと 不安でした

translation.en: Headmaster Grimm?
translation.ja: グリム校長

translation.en: Forgive me for startling you, my dear.
translation.ja: 驚かせてすまない

translation.en: I need you to keep an eye on your roommate, Raven.
translation.ja: レイヴンの行動を 監視してくれないか

translation.en: We must follow the paths set out before us.
translation.ja: 我々は運命に背けない

translation.en: It's the only way to keep our world safe.
translation.ja: この世界の平和を守るために

translation.en: Please, watch Raven and convince her of this.
translation.ja: どうにかして レイヴンを説得してほしい

translation.en: I know you'll do whatever it takes.
translation.ja: 君なら やり遂げるはずだ

translation.en: I'll--
translation.ja: 私…

translation.en: Female Narrator: And so... on the grave portent about to befall Ever After High--
translation.ja: エバー･アフター･ハイは 不穏な空気に包まれました

translation.en: Male Narrator: Must you always be so dramatic?
translation.ja: 君はいつも大げさだな

translation.en: Female Narrator: Must you always ruin my ominous endings?
translation.ja: あなたこそ いつも 邪魔しないでよ

translation.en: Male Narrator: You're always taking the Royals' side. Female Narrator: I mean, I'm known for my endings.
translation.ja: 運命は変えられないわ

translation.en: Female Narrator: And so here we are-- Legacy Day,
translation.ja: ついに訪れたレガシー･デー

translation.en: where the students of Ever After High signed
translation.ja: エバー･アフター･ハイの 生徒たちが エバー･アフター･ハイの 生徒たちが “レガシー･デー”

translation.en: the Storybook of Legends, pledging to follow
translation.ja: エバー･アフター･ハイの 生徒たちが “レガシー･デー” エバー･アフター･ハイの 生徒たちが 運命に従うことを 宣誓する日です

translation.en: the paths of their fairy-tale parents.
translation.ja: 運命に従うことを 宣誓する日です

translation.en: Male Narrator: Or not.
translation.ja: それはどうかな

translation.en: Female Narrator: Seriously? I'm narrating here.
translation.ja: もう！ 邪魔しないで

translation.en: ( sighs ) Maddie, you have to help me.
translation.ja: マディ 助けて

translation.en: I don't feel like I can sign the Storybook of Legends, but I don't want to let everyone down, either.
translation.ja: 宣誓したくないけど みんなを失望させたくない

translation.en: And do not forget the whole, "If you don't sign, your story disappears. Poof!
translation.ja: 宣誓しなければ 物語が消えてなくなるのよ

translation.en: And you may vanish into oblivion."
translation.ja: あなたも消えちゃう

translation.en: ( gasps ) That's a thing, you know, and it's gotta hurt.
translation.ja: それでもいいの？

translation.en: But we don't know if that's true.
translation.ja: でも嘘かも

translation.en: - But what if it is? - But what if it's not?
translation.ja: 本当かも 嘘かも

translation.en: - But what if it is? - You're not helping.
translation.ja: 本当かも 力になってよ

translation.en: Wait a tick. ♪ I think I know who can help! ♪
translation.ja: そうだ！ あの人に相談しよう

translation.en: No, but see-- I am totally a Royal.
translation.ja: 私は運命を信じる ロイヤル派よ

translation.en: ( locker door slams ) Raven!
translation.ja: レイヴン！

translation.en: There you are. We have to talk.
translation.ja: 来て　話があるの

translation.en: Come back!
translation.ja: 待って

translation.en: Apple, where are you going?
translation.ja: アップル　どこへ？

translation.en: I have to convince Raven to sign the book. My destiny depends on it.
translation.ja: レイヴンを説得しなきゃ 私の運命が懸かってる

translation.en: Raven? ( echoing )
translation.ja: レイヴン？

translation.en: If anyone knows the truth about the Storybook of Legends,
translation.ja: おとぎ話の本の 真相を知るのは

translation.en: it's Giles Grimm.
translation.ja: ジャイルズ･グリムよ

translation.en: Feathers and friends, together, alone.
translation.ja: 羽根よ　友よ　ハロー

translation.en: He's speaking Riddlish.
translation.ja: リドル語だわ！

translation.en: He was cursed with a babble spell. Makes him sound. you know, bru-ru-ru, cuckoo.
translation.ja: 呪いのせいで おかしくなったの

translation.en: He says it's nice to have us here.
translation.ja: “ようこそ”って意味よ

translation.en: Ask him about the book.
translation.ja: 彼に聞いて

translation.en: If I don't sign, am I really gonna-- disappear?
translation.ja: 宣誓しなければ 私は消えちゃうの？

translation.en: Mm-hmm. Can a musical chair change its tone when the tablet of granite is inscribed with a bone?
translation.ja: 石(ストーン)がすと～んと落ちたら 物語のトーンは変わる？

translation.en: Hmm. The king who sings with pages of sky
translation.ja: 王(キング)は歌う(シング)

translation.en: fears too much the dawn that rises with lies.
translation.ja: 嘘(ライ)をつく者は空(スカイ)から落ちる

translation.en: He says there's something wrong with the book,
translation.ja: 本のことを言ってるわ

translation.en: and that if you don't sign, your story... will...
translation.ja: サインしなければ あなたの物語は…

translation.en: What? What?! ( splashing )
translation.ja: 何？ どうなるの？

translation.en: Oh, sorry.
translation.ja: あら 失礼

translation.en: If you don't sign, your story will continue.
translation.ja: あなたの物語は続くって

translation.en: Ah, really? Oh, that's great.
translation.ja: ほんと？ よかった

translation.en: I think.
translation.ja: たぶんね

translation.en: Uhh! You think?
translation.ja: たぶん？

translation.en: Hey! Riddlish is not an exact language.
translation.ja: リドル語って意味不明なの

translation.en: Female Narrator: At last it was Legacy Day.
translation.ja: レガシー･デーの本番

translation.en: Next we have Apple White.
translation.ja: 次はアップル･ホワイト

translation.en: I am Apple White, daughter of Snow White,
translation.ja: 私 アップル･ホワイトは 白雪姫の娘として

translation.en: and I am ready to pledge my destiny.
translation.ja: 運命に従うことを誓います

translation.en: And next, Raven Queen.
translation.ja: 次はレイヴン･クイーン

translation.en: I am Raven Queen, daughter of the evil queen,
translation.ja: 私はレイヴン･クイーン 悪の女王の娘です

translation.en: and... I pledge... uh... I...
translation.ja: 私はここに誓います…

translation.en: Come on, do it!
translation.ja: さあ 言って

translation.en: I am Raven Queen,
translation.ja: 私 レイヴン･クイーンは

translation.en: and I'm going to write my own destiny.
translation.ja: 運命を書き直します

translation.en: My "happily ever after" starts now.
translation.ja: ハッピーエンドの物語が 今 始まります

translation.en: Raven did it!
translation.ja: やったわ！

translation.en: ( sighing )
translation.ja: 私… 生きてる

translation.en: I'm still here. I didn't disappear.
translation.ja: 私… 生きてる 消えなかった

translation.en: How could you be so... so selfish?
translation.ja: あなたって なんて身勝手なの

translation.en: I'm sorry, Apple, but I... oh!
translation.ja: アップル　許して

translation.en: Hold everything!
translation.ja: すべて固まれ！

translation.en: I didn't know I could do that.
translation.ja: こんな力があったなんて

translation.en: I'm sorry, Apple,
translation.ja: ごめんね

translation.en: but I don't want anyone to tell me who to be. I want to figure that out on my own.
translation.ja: でも どう生きるかは 自分で決めたいの

translation.en: And don't you understand?
translation.ja: 分からない？

translation.en: I'm not the only one who gets to choose their own destiny now.
translation.ja: 運命を選べるのは 私だけじゃない

translation.en: We all do-- even you.
translation.ja: みんなも あなたもよ

translation.en: But I don't want to choose a new destiny. I liked the one I had,
translation.ja: 私は決められた人生を 生きたいの

translation.en: and because of you it might not happen.
translation.ja: それをあなたが奪った

translation.en: But it might.
translation.ja: そんな…

translation.en: I don't know. I... I just don't know.
translation.ja: 私は… どうすればいいの？

translation.en: Wow!
translation.ja: すごい

translation.en: You're still here. No poof, poof, poof. Yay!
translation.ja: あなた 消えなかったのね

translation.en: I know. It feels good.
translation.ja: ええ　最高の気分よ

translation.en: Male Narrator: Life between the Royals and the Rebels
translation.ja: レイヴンの勇気ある行動が

translation.en: at Ever After High would never be the same
translation.ja: レイヴンの勇気ある行動が 生徒たちの運命を変えた

translation.en: after Raven stood up for what she believed.
translation.ja: 生徒たちの運命を変えた

translation.en: Female Narrator: What she believed was wrong. She didn't honor her destiny. She tempted fate.
translation.ja: 運命に背くなんて間違ってる

translation.en: Listen, narrators, we are trying to have a nice moment here.
translation.ja: ナレーターさん！ 感動に浸らせてよ

translation.en: Raven does not know the forces she has released.
translation.ja: レイヴンの力が解き放たれた

translation.en: This must be contained before her dangerous idea spreads.
translation.ja: 彼女の影響力を 阻止しなければ

translation.en: ( fairy-tale theme music )
translation.ja: 終わりは始まりにすぎない
